Column.Name: CASE WHEN T_SHUKKIN_KESHIKOMI.SEISAN_NUMBER > 0 THEN ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_SHIHARAI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_SEI_SOTOZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_SEI_UTIZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_DEN_SOTOZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_DEN_UTIZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_MEI_SOTOZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_MEI_UTIZEI_GAKU,0) ELSE ISNULL(M_TORIHIKISAKI_SHIHARAI.KAISHI_KAIKAKE_ZANDAKA,0) END

CASE WHEN T_SHUKKIN_KESHIKOMI.SEISAN_NUMBER > 0 THEN ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_SHIHARAI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_SEI_SOTOZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_SEI_UTIZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_DEN_SOTOZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_DEN_UTIZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_MEI_SOTOZEI_GAKU,0) + ISNULL(T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.KONKAI_MEI_UTIZEI_GAKU,0) - ISNULL(T_SHUKKIN_KESHIKOMI.KESHIKOMI_GAKU,0) ELSE ISNULL(M_TORIHIKISAKI_SHIHARAI.KAISHI_KAIKAKE_ZANDAKA,0) - ISNULL(T_SHUKKIN_KESHIKOMI3.KESHIKOMI_GAKU_TOTAL,0) END

OutputColumnSelect.JoinCondition: LEFT JOIN M_KYOTEN M_KYOTEN1 ON T_SHUKKIN_ENTRY.KYOTEN_CD = M_KYOTEN1.KYOTEN_CD
LEFT JOIN M_TORIHIKISAKI M_TORIHIKISAKI1 ON T_SHUKKIN_KESHIKOMI.TORIHIKISAKI_CD = M_TORIHIKISAKI1.TORIHIKISAKI_CD
LEFT JOIN M_SYUKKINSAKI M_SYUKKINSAKI1 ON T_SHUKKIN_ENTRY.SHUKKINSAKI_CD = M_SYUKKINSAKI1.SYUKKINSAKI_CD
LEFT JOIN M_GYOUSHA M_GYOUSHA1 ON T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.GYOUSHA_CD = M_GYOUSHA1.GYOUSHA_CD
LEFT JOIN M_GENBA M_GENBA1 ON T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.GYOUSHA_CD = M_GENBA1.GYOUSHA_CD AND T_SEISAN_DENPYOU_KAGAMI.GENBA_CD = M_GENBA1.GENBA_CD
